name: Mandiant Threat Intelligence
description: Provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs), CVE information, as well as information on the adversary from the Mandiant Threat Intelligence API.

options.name: Mandiant V3 URL
options.description: The URL for the Mandiant Threat Intelligence V3 API.  Defaults to `https://api.intelligence.fireeye.com`. Leave empty if your keys are not compatible with this API version.

options.name: Mandiant V4 URL
options.description: The URL for the Mandiant Threat Intelligence V4 API.  Defaults to `https://api.intelligence.mandiant.com`. Leave empty if your keys are not compatible with this API version.

options.name: Public Key
options.description: Your Mandiant Threat Intelligence API public key

options.name: Private Key
options.description: Your Mandiant Threat Intelligence API private key.

options.name: Minimum MScore to Display
options.description: The minimum MScore (0-100) required for indicators to be displayed [default is 80].  Indicators with a MScore above 80 are considered malicious.

options.name: Ignored Entities
options.description: Comma separated list of entities that you never want looked up. Should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Ignored Domains Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no domains will be black listed).  Should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 20.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 100.
